mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with the correct use of a preposition: After winter vacations, the University is opening in Monday, After winter vacations, the University is opening on Monday, After winter vacations, the University is opening by Monday, After winter vacations, the University is opening at Monday

options.a: After winter vacations, the University is opening in Monday
options.b: After winter vacations, the University is opening on Monday
options.c: After winter vacations, the University is opening by Monday
